items.name: case userDeclined
items.desc: The user didn’t grant Screen Recording permission to your app.

items.name: case missingEntitlements
items.desc: An error occurred due to missing entitlements.

items.name: case attemptToStartStreamState
items.desc: The system can’t start a stream because it’s already in a recording state.

items.name: case attemptToStopStreamState
items.desc: The system can’t stop a stream because it’s in a recording state.

items.name: case attemptToUpdateFilterState
items.desc: The system can’t update the stream to use the new content filter.

items.name: case attemptToConfigState
items.desc: The system can’t update the stream to use the new configuration.

items.name: case failedToStart
items.desc: The system can’t start the stream.

items.name: case internalError
items.desc: The system can’t start the stream due to a failure in the media capture stack.

items.name: case removingStream
items.desc: The system can’t remove a stream.

items.name: case noCaptureSource
items.desc: The stream doesn’t have a source to capture.

items.name: case noDisplayList
items.desc: The stream doesn’t have a display list.

items.name: case noWindowList
items.desc: The stream doesn’t have a window list.

items.name: case failedApplicationConnectionInvalid
items.desc: Capture failed because the stream lost its connection to an app.

items.name: case failedApplicationConnectionInterrupted
items.desc: Capture failed because there was an interruption in a connection to an app.

items.name: case failedNoMatchingApplicationContext
items.desc: Capture failed because there isn’t a matching app context.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: An operation failed due to receiving an invalid parameter value.
